event_des: Regulatory: Japan recognises Bitcoin as legal tender & regulates exchanges
Regulatory: People's Bank of China forbid payment in BTC
Cybersecurity: Mt Gov Scandal ($473M in Bitcoin stolen)
Speculation: Bitcoin reaches all-time peak value;  bubble bursts
Protocol: Bitcoin splits into Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash; latter focussing on improving transaction effciency
News: JP Morgan CEO calls Bitcoin a "fraud"
News: JPM coin announced, leveraging blockchain for interbank transactions
Darkweb: Original Silk Road ceased by FBI
News: Facebook bans cryptocurrency advertisements; followed by google two months later
